description:
Katy Perry was crowned Woman of the Year at the Elle Style Awards on Tuesday night.周二晚，凯蒂·佩里被评为ELLE风尚大典年度女性。

The 29-year-old singer was presented with one of the main trophies of the night by The Voice coach Kylie Minogue.这位29岁的歌手从英国好声音导师凯莉米洛手中接过奖杯。

Katy wore a silk ivory rose print Vivienne Westwood Prestige dress, while she had opted for a wavy bob look for her hair.She also sported a ring on her engagement finger, just days after she did the same thing on Valentine's Day fuelling rumours she and boyfriend John Mayer were set to tie the knot.凯蒂穿着Vivienne Westwood的象牙色丝绸连身裙，上面绣着玫瑰的图案，并选择了波浪型的卷发。水果姐当天的无名指上戴着戒指，传言她即将和男友约翰·梅尔结婚。

British actor Tom Hiddleston won ELLE Man of the Year but he was unable to attend the ceremony and instead compiled a video message to accept the accolade. 英国演员汤姆·希德勒斯顿获封ELLE年度先生，由于抖森无法出席，他特意录制了视频。

Winners of the Elle Style Awards 2014 ELLE2014风尚大典获奖名单

UK Recording Artist Female: Lily Allen英国年度女性唱片艺术家：莉莉·艾伦

British Designer of the Year: Christopher Kane英国年度最佳设计师：克里斯托弗·凯恩

ELLE Model of the Year: Suki WaterhouseELLE年度模特：苏琪·沃特豪斯

UK Recording Artist Male: Tinie Tempah英国年度男性唱片艺术家：泰尼·坦帕

Accessory Designer of the Year: Kate Hillier年度配件设计师：凯蒂·西尔里斯

ELLE Man of the Year: Tom HiddlestonELLE年度最佳男性：汤姆·希德勒斯顿

Red Carpet Designer of the Year: Emilia Wickstead年度红毯礼服设计师：艾米利亚·维克斯蒂德

Contemporary Designer of the Year: Isabel Marant当代设计师：伊莎贝尔·玛兰

Fashion Innovator: Nicola Formichetti for Diesel流行创新者：Diesel总监尼克拉·弗米切提

International Recording Artist: Pharrell Williams国际唱片艺术家：法瑞尔·威廉姆斯

Actress of the Year: Emma Watson年度演员：艾玛·沃特森

Lifetime Achievement: David Bailey终身成就奖：大卫·贝利

ELLE Woman of the Year: Katy PerryELLE年度最佳女性：凯蒂·佩里

title: ELLE风尚大典 水果姐当选时尚年度女性
